snippet: As part of National Same-Sex Kiss Day, more than 14,000 had signed up for a Facebook event that encouraged couples to visit one of the restaurants and photograph themselves kissing.
abstract: As part of National Same-Sex Kiss Day, more than 14,000 had signed up for a Facebook event that encouraged couples to visit one of the restaurants and photograph themselves kissing.

byline.original: By JENNIFER PRESTON, ROBBIE BROWN and KIM SEVERSON

headline.main: Gay Couples Head to Chick-fil-A for Kiss-In Protest

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
